heading: passage: john chafee, 77
subheading: a moderate, even liberal, republican in a heavily democratic state, chafee served rhode island as both senator and governor. chafee, who died sunday night from cardiac arrest, also did stints as a state representative and secretary of the navy. the scion of one of rhode island's most powerful families, chafee was reelected to the senate three times, serving nearly 23 years.
author: wired staff
text: a moderate, even liberal, republican in a heavily democratic state, chafee served rhode island as both senator and governor. chafee, who died sunday night from cardiac arrest, also did stints as a state representative and secretary of the navy. the scion of one of rhode island's most powerful families, chafee was reelected to the senate three times, serving nearly 23 years.
